name: Sana's Great Return To Space
description:
(This game was made for Tsukumo Sana's birthday, 1st member of HoloCouncil, link to her channel underneath)

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsUj0dszADCGbF3gNrQEuSQ

After crashing into an asteroid field surrounding a derelict world, and crash-landing onto the planet after being separated from her best friend, Sana must now climb her way back up to space, on a dangerous adventure to reunite with Yagatarasu!

SGRTS is a tower-based platformer, inspired after games like Celeste, Jump King, or Mighty Jill Off. Where movement and situational awareness means everything and luck means little. That said, this game is not for the faint of heart, but perfect for those seasoned with platformer games.

Players beware! Feel free to share your times and high scores underneath! Any and all feedback would be greatly appreciated!

CONTROLS:

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

  • MOVING LEFT: A, J, LEFT ARROW KEY
  • MOVING RIGHT: D, L, RIGHT ARROW KEY
  • JUMPING: W, I, UP ARROW KEY, SPACEBAR, SHIFT
  • FALLING THROUGH PLATFORMS: S, K, DOWN ARROW KEY
  • (retry): R, BACKSPACE

GAMEPAD CONTROLS:

  • MOVING LEFT: D-PAD LEFT, LEFT JOYSTICK LEFT
  • MOVING RIGHT: D-PAD RIGHT, LEFT JOYSTICK RIGHT
  • JUMPING: D-PAD UP, A BUTTON
  • FALLING THROUGH PLATFORMS: D-PAD DOWN, B BUTTON, LEFT BUMPER, RIGHT BUMPER
  • (retry): Y Button, Back Button

Hold down the jump keys to charge up jumps.

You can repeatedly press the jump keys in mid-air to activate levitation. 

DISCLAIMER: This game was made as a fan-made project, under the fan work/derivative works guidelines put in place by Cover Corp./Hololive. Additionally, any and all third-party assets and references used in this game shall be properly stated and credited. Please support the channels/content creators referenced in this game.

Link: https://en.hololive.tv/terms
